description: Upload, view, and query data. Get insights and make charts with AI. No code required.
title: Tablepad - AI for Data AnalyticsSheets-icon
keywords: ai, analysis, analytics, data, csv, json, arrow, parquet, google sheets
introduction: TablePad is a platform that allows users to connect any data source, query in plain language, and extract actionable insights without requiring any coding skills.
targetPeople: Individuals and businesses looking to analyze data without coding skills

faqs.question: What is a credit?
faqs.answer: One credit is one query. Unused credits do not roll over.

faqs.question: What is the maximum size of data sources supported?
faqs.answer: The Free plan supports data sources up to 2MB, while the Pro plan supports data sources up to 1GB.
